de.hshl.obj.loader.materials

Class RGB

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshl.obj.meta.Reflective.DataClass
      • de.hshl.obj.loader.materials.RGB

  • public final class RGB
extends Reflective.DataClass
    Store colors as a combination of red, green, and blue. Values in MTL files commonly range from zero to one.
    Author:
    Johannes Vollmer
    See Also:
    MTL, Texture, toFloatArray()

    • Method Detail

      • toFloatArray

        public float[] toFloatArray()
        Construct an array containing [red, green, blue]. As the RGB values will be converted from double to float, this may reduce precision of the individual values. RGB values commonly range from zero to one.
        Returns:
        The float array containing red, green, and blue.
